column5: I don't remember this being posted before. This site has information on cold water emersion, life jackets. floater coats and such.  http://www.coldwaterbootcamp.com/pages/home.html

A couple of guys from our unit were in the last one they did. Although it is very informative to see and I do recommend you see it I think anyone that plays in cold water should test out their gear in the same cold water in a controlled manner(beach with a rope and a buddy) in very cold water not dressed for the pool but with everything on you are going to be out in(make sure it floats you). It is a shock and what you think may be your reaction to a situation changes very quickly when you loose your grip  Just saying Peter
